title: Was Lanka Truly Ravana’s Kingdom? Bala Sankuratri Reveals the Hidden Truth Behind the Ancient Claim
description: Was Lanka truly the golden kingdom of Ravana, or is the truth far more complex than the legends suggest? Drawing insights from the Surya Siddhanta and the interpretations of Bala Sankuratri, this discussion explores ancient astronomical references, geography, and scriptures. It examines how time, latitude, and celestial calculations connect Lanka to Vedic knowledge. The narrative goes beyond mythology to uncover symbolic and scientific meanings hidden in the texts. A thought-provoking journey into where history, astronomy, and belief intersect.

title: Toby Carvery restaurant facing eviction over felling of ancient oak tree
description: A Toby Carvery restaurant is facing eviction from its north London site over the partial felling of an oak tree which was believed to be up to 500 years old.

title: Barn for ducks built in protected ancient woodland without planning permission
description: Barn built on part of an ancient woodland and in a protected area without planning permission.
